channel.title: Comments on: FiringSquad’s Ultimate Gaming Machine

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: You'd be amazed at how sub-monkey I can sink.
item.content:encoded: You’d be amazed at how sub-monkey I can sink.

item.title: By: Saccia
item.dc:creator: Saccia
item.description: Actually, water-cooled machines are much easier now. A while back you only did it for extreme l33tness because there was a danger that you could screw your machine if it leaked. However, if you buy a good water cooling solution they are usually well sealed and packaged so that even a monkey could do it without the danger of it leaking.
item.content:encoded: Actually, water-cooled machines are much easier now. A while back you only did it for extreme l33tness because there was a danger that you could screw your machine if it leaked. However, if you buy a good water cooling solution they are usually well sealed and packaged so that even a monkey could do it without the danger of it leaking.
